price: Andolsun ki biz, öğüt alsınlar diye, bu Kur'an’da insanlara her türlü misali verdik.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ضَرَبۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ḍarabnā lilnnāsi fī hādhā al-qur'āni min kulli mathalin laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
